description: This creamy peanut butter fudge makes a delightful homemade gift or divine sweet treat for yourself. Plus, this easy recipe takes just minutes to prep.
name: 4Ingredient Peanut Butter Fudge Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup toasted salted peanuts, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 20cm square cake pan with baking paper, extending paper 3cm above edges.
Place condensed milk and chocolate melts in a microwavesafe bowl. Microwave, uncovered, on medium for 1 minute, stirring halfway with a metal spoon, or until melted and smooth. Stir in peanut butter.
Pour mixture into pan and smooth top. Sprinkle with peanuts. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm. Cut into 16 pieces. Serve.
